name: Kings Vs Pirates
description:
Welcome to Kings Vs Pirates!

In this game a powerful king and a terrible pirate navigate through the seven seas to find the legendary treasure of the ancients. Which side will you take?

The players will be able to choose between kings and pirates to battle against each other in a several maps and the final champion will receive the prize.

This game is a super early prototype so if you download it, you will find a very simple game to try. Initially as a  local multiplayer game and the objective is to capture the key and bring back to the chest. The first play to get the key 5 times win!

Feel free to download , try and give send feedbacks in comments or direct to me at twitter 

Every week a new update will be posted here, so stay tuned!

PS: The awesome art is from PixelFrog

Engine: Unity

Status: Work In Progress

Release date: TBD
